mapper.insert: insert into board values (board_SEQ.nextval, #{boardSubject}, #{memberId}, #{boardContent}, nvl(#{boardFile},0), sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board order by boardNum desc)tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select count(*) from board where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
